page.title: 02GAZATEER HIGH ERCALL
page.content: Continued from page 1. and Church:Shawbury.Haughmond Abbey near Shrewsbury. Amenities Shops_High Ercall and Roden.Mobile library van each Monday 14.15_19.30. Refreshments_Cleveland Arms. Cats Hotel and Kennels_High Ercall. Post Office_High Ercall.Village Hall_High Ercall. Sports and Leisure Playing Fields_High Ercall and Roden. Bowling Green and Tennis Club at High Ercall. Religion Church of England Church and Methodist Chapel in High Ercall. Education Pre_School Playgroup and County Primary School in High Ercall.
